name: Temptare Subjectium XIII
description:
This is our entry for Ludum Dare 24. Pelagus, the protagonist, is tested by the evil professor, Nemo Sas, and must defeat evolved creatures so that he too can evolve and escape. But in the end, will the professor's forces be too much? 

Created with Game Maker.

Developers:
Programming - Wizered67
Graphics - Hoovyscoot
Backgrounds - POtatoes234
General Help - Viper1044
Story boarding - Pandadog123

Final Notes: Because of the time constrictions on this game, there may be some minor bugs in the game. If you happen to get stuck in a tile, generally you will be able to get unstuck. Music is not ours.
